name: Soliloquy
text:
Count me as a perpetual drifter of/ Stoplights and stopsigns./

Highway exits gift better/ Than city grates and subway stops./ They can exit here. Fast./ Guilt hides with time/ Or faster yet, with distance/

I took my shirt off/ Cause I knew you’d stare/ Bent kneeward, seated with business/ In my gut,/ Flesh, folded flesh/ Shoe tie tries/ Umbrellas and garbage./ You’ve seen me near dumpsters. In warm debris/ Sun scalds and bloated arms blending/
